results.title: The Bowery Mission's 2025 Valentine Gala
results.content: Our 26th Annual Valentine Gala was held Thursday, February 13. Amidst the challenges of rising homelessness in New York City, we celebrated The Bowery Mission'

results.title: Events - Answer the Call
results.content:
For more information on any events and how you can support, please email staff@answerthecall.org or contact our office at 646-731-9630.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UPCOMING 2025 EVENTS:
-------------------------

### 40th Annual GalaThursday, October 23, 2025

 6 pm EST | Cipriani Wall Street [...] The 40th Annual Gala will be a festive evening that brings together New York City’s philanthropic community, the widows and widowers we serve, and the first responders who protect our city. Tickets and Sponsorship Packages are available!

Image 2

PAST 2025 EVENTS:
---------------------

### 12th Annual Red & Blue SoireeThursday, May 8, 2025

 7 pm EST | SECOND NYC [...] This will be a festive evening of cocktails and music marks a celebratory start to summer and most importantly – all to benefit the widows, widowers, and children of our fallen first responders. Tickets, Chair Packages, and Sponsorship Packages are available! Please visit givergy.us/soiree to learn more.

Image 3

### 40th Annual Game & Family DayWednesday, May 28, 2025

 5:40 pm EST | Citi Field

results.title: 2025 The Way Home Gala | BRC Bowery Residents' Committee
results.content:
Join us on Monday, June 9, 2025 at the Ziegfeld Ballroom in New York City, as we honor our fearless leader, Muzzy Rosenblatt, and celebrate 25 years of transformative leadership and his commitment to our clients and the mission of Bowery Residents' Committee.

​ [...] ​

And we're not stopping there. In the coming years, we will build more than 800 additional units of affordable housing and shelter - places of healing and transformation to further aid in alleviating homelessness in New York City.

​

Your attendance at The Way Home Gala will contribute directly to BRC's innovative and groundbreaking programs, providing critical resources for New Yorkers experiencing homelessness and helping them reclaim their lives and achieve their potential. [...] Prime seating for 10 guests · Prominent donor listing on event invitation · Full-screen ad in virtual journal · Logo and link to your website on event promotional materials and the BRC website · Recognition from the podium during event

​

​

##### Leader - $25,000​

Prime seating for 10 guests · Prominent donor listing on event invitation · Half-screen ad in virtual journal · Logo and link to your website on event promotional materials and the BRC website

​

##### Advocate - $10,000​

results.answer: The Bowery Mission's 40th Annual Gala will be held October 23, 2025, at Cipriani Wall Street. Tickets and sponsorship packages are available. The event supports New York City’s first responders and their families.
